head.supplied: Melbourne Botan Garden, 21/3/73 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you that I submitted your letter (N.3634) ¶ of the 14th inst. to the trustees of the Royal Park at a meeting held this day, when ...

div.p: A345 Royal Park Zoological Society letter & minute book, p.56, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

I have the honor to inform you that I submitted your letter (N.3634)
See C. Hodgkinson to M, 14 May 1873. of the 14th inst. to the trustees of the Royal Park at a meeting held this day, when I was desired to express to the hon. the Minister of the Lands Department the best thanks of the trustees for the courtesy shown them by consulting them in reference to the intended sale of land at Park Street, and further to inform the hon. the Minister, that the trustees would respectfully offer their opinion on this question in a very short time.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be Sir, Your obedient

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: The Assist Commissioner of Lands & Survey.
